title: Cavendish Sits Up in Sprint Marred by Nasty Crash, Sagan Hits Deck in Road Return in Hungary
content:
Welsford fastest in messy sprint, and Sagan was caught up in a pileup early in the stage in a surprise return to road racing.

Read the full article at Cavendish Sits Up in Sprint Marred by Nasty Crash, Sagan Hits Deck in Road Return in Hungary on Velo.
author: ahood
